articles.title: UK biotech group raises £48mn for Alzheimer's research - Financial Times
articles.description: AstronauTx’s financing is step towards helping millions of people suffering from disease
articles.content:
A UK biotech company exploring new ways of treating Alzheimers and other neurodegenerative diseases has raised £48mn ($61mn) in its first big funding round.
